content: Experienced using Figma for mock-ups to design and implement UIs
Awarded Best UI/UX design for a recipe UI I designed and created at HawkHacks
Experience with vector illustration and animation
Experienced using React to implement UIs with stateful components and hooks
Completed two internships working with React to maintain and update product applications
Experience with React context and routers, and using React + TypeScript
Experience setting up RESTful API endpoints with Python (Flask) and NodeJS (Express)
Experience working across the stack during hackathons to implement the complete app
Experience with NoSQL (MongoDB) and SQL (Postgres) database integration into backend APIs
